name: getstatsbymonth
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trinidad_covid_19_statistics.
Tool description: This API provides Covid-19 statistics by year, month, day and most recent day in Trinidad and Tobago
API description: This endpoint fetches Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by month. For a valid response, the months are input as "01" or "12" and not the actual month name such as "January" or "December".

yearid.description: The year for which the statistics are needed, formatted as a four-digit string (e.g., "2022").

monthid.description: The month for which the statistics are needed, formatted as a two-digit string (e.g., "01" for January).
